title: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
In case you haven't heard, AOL accidentally released a database dump containing nearly 40 million (anonymous) search logs from their customers. There's some pretty disturbing - not to mention hilarious and tragic - stuff in there, so why not go have a look?

[url=http://czern.homeip.net/aolsearch/]czern.homeip.net/aolsearch/[/url]

(The two people who searched for the term "Commander Keen" have some rather weird search terms as well)

EDIT: Content is probably not work-safe.[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
*Searches for Galaxieretter*

Damnit!-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
Hmmm, haven't heard of this yet. This site says "AOL Labs recently published the search queries of 650,000 Users for research and educational purposes.", but perhaps it's not true. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
Neither have I. But a simple Google-news search for "AOL" yielded many results such as this one.

[url=http://www.chron.com/disp/story.mpl/ap/fn/4116578.html]www.chron.com/disp/story.mpl/ap/fn/4116578.html[/url]

Apparently this was bad enough to yield federal investigation. People were searching their Social Security numbers and whatnot and the search results are apparently a beak in privacy.

Funny.

And... interesting...-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
Most popular searches: porn, somethingawful, nigger, murder, something awful, woot

title: Re: Those AOL Search Logs
content:
Uh... I searched with quotes: "commander keen"
and clicked on the first result with the forums address on it... and found the person to by either gay, or a very peverted female...
